titleStmt.title: His grace the Duke of Monmouth honoured in his progress in the west of England in an account of a most extraordinary cure of the kings evil given in a letter from Crookhorn in the county of Somerset from the minister of the parish and many others.
titleStmt.author: Clark, Henry, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Signed by Clark and eight others.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
